channel.title: No-ip issues
channel.description: Hello, I have had a similar post to this before, and I thought that I found my solution, but I didn't. I have been using a no-ip for my server under .info After a month or two i removed it, and replaced it with .biz But, the server was still running by .info, even though it is completely deleted and removed from my no-ip account, and not even available in my DUC Client. I asked on the forums, and I Vain I, A very helpful member of the moparscape community asked if I have waited 24 hours + as the process can take that long, So, I decided that my issue was fixed, but it wasn't, so far it has been 2 days and it is still going under .info, I even created a new no-ip account, but still, no difference... Does ANYONE know how i can get rid of this no-ip.info?

item.title: No-ip issues
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

Ahh the same thing happend to me. the way I fixed it was I portforwared all over again if it works for me hope it works for yuh cheer$ ;D

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip issues
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

jmood128:

Did you log in to your no-ip client with your .biz account? Not the web site the client on your computer.

Yes. I have updated my DUC Client… Its just that I don’t want the server ip to be .info anymore, and Idk how to get rid of it because i already removed it from my host management.

Read full topic

with like the
Username: Avg4W
Password: B5fcG , etc.

item.title: No-ip issues
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

pure2ownage:

uninstall it and reinstall; your only option.

I just uninstalled it and reinstalled it. But people are still successfully logging into the .info and unsuccessfully logging into the .biz

PS: I have tried to release a status for my .biz on mopar, and it tells me to login to the server with a certain account. But after 24 hours it didn’t go through… Yet, this could be a sign since the server has to be online for them to ask you to do taht.

Read full topic

I have been using a no-ip for my server under .info
After a month or two i removed it, and replaced it with .biz
